oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Talabante Clavería, Beatriz
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The project involves the design of the feet and the sidebar for a height adjustable table. Rol Ergo AB works with steel, but they acccept other materials such as aluminum or plastic components. The assembly with other components (adjustable legs) has to be easy to reduce the manufacturing time. Rol Ergo AB wants to develop a new design for adjustable legs, which would be different from what they currently have. In the initial design phase, there are no limits. Any shape, material or added function is valid. At later stages, limits will be set.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Universidad de Zaragoza; Departamento de Ingeniería de Diseño y Fabricación; Área de Expresión Gráfica de la Ingeniería
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ingeniero Técnico en Diseño Industrial
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design of the feet and the sidebar for a height-adjustable table
